Author: Microsoft Events
Title: Connect everything achieve anything and transform your enterprise | BRKSP485
Description:
Learn how SAP and Microsoft Cloud can accelerate your Cloud-ERP transformation. Experience how Business Data Cloud (BDC) and SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP) can unlock leading Business AI capabilities by delivering a trusted end-to-end foundation built for innovation. This session will be brought to life with demos, use cases, and tools that help you connect everything so you can achieve anything.
